translations: n.[皮肤][植] 瘢痕，伤痕；叶痕

phrs.translation: 瘢痕, 叶痕, 出版者, 伤痕
疤顿凝胶, 生物活性凝胶, 沃普牌疤顿保健软膏
脐带瘢, 脐带瘢痕英语
杀掉死亡之君, 死亡之君
不良瘢痕, 恶性瘢癜

sentences.sentence: Objective to observe osteogenesis of percutaneous autogenous bone marrow into cicatrix of bone defect.
sentences.translation: 目的观察经皮自体骨髓移植在骨缺损瘢痕组织内的成骨作用。

sentences.sentence: Objective:To evaluate the three methods of reconstructing cicatrix contracture on the face and anterior neck.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察面、颈部瘢痕挛缩三种修复方法的疗效。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To investigate the practical value of facial flat-cicatrix treatment by applying dermal soft tissue expansion.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨应用皮肤软组织扩张术治疗面部扁平瘢痕的实用价值。
